players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Alice was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: remained silent.
Diana: remained silent.
You: "I am innocent and need your help to catch the mafia."
Charlie: "I investigated Alice and found her innocent. I also discovered that Diana is the mafioso. Keep an eye on her."
You: "I am innocent and will work with Charlie to investigate Diana. Let's catch the mafia together."
Diana: "I am innocent and will continue to cooperate with Charlie. Let's catch the mafia together."
Votes: Bob voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
Diana was arrested

players.name: Charlie
memory: You're Charlie, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Alice was found dead.
You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Diana knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
You: remained silent.
Diana: remained silent.
Bob: "I am innocent and need your help to catch the mafia."
You: "I investigated Alice and found her innocent. I also discovered that Diana is the mafioso. Keep an eye on her."
Bob: "I am innocent and will work with Charlie to investigate Diana. Let's catch the mafia together."
Diana: "I am innocent and will continue to cooperate with Charlie. Let's catch the mafia together."
Votes: Bob voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
Diana was arrested

players.name: Diana

Day 1 begins.

Bob: "I am innocent and need your help to catch the mafia."
Charlie: "I investigated Alice and found her innocent. I also discovered that Diana is the mafioso. Keep an eye on her."
Bob: "I am innocent and will work with Charlie to investigate Diana. Let's catch the mafia together."
